markdownRemark.html: 1st Fuengirola Scout Group includes Scouts, Guides, Cubs, Brownies, Beavers and Rainbows. Between them they cover boys and girls from ages 6 to 14. Their objective is to educate, enrich and entertain in a mixture of formal, informal, challenging or just plain fun situations. Scouting for girls and boys in the Mijas Costa area, following the same programme as Scouting in the UK. Regular meetings (except in the summer) at The Ark Christian Fellowship Hall, upper level of the Las Rampas Centre, Fuengirola.
